10

Patrick to overhaul housing

Gov. Deval Patrick will propose eliminating the state's troubled patchwork of 240 public housing authorities and replacing them with six regional agencies. (Globe)
  • 10/13/12: Public housing chiefs face little accountability
  • 04/24/12: Medford housing chief scrutinized over hirings

Holiday sales off target for retailers

Retailers across Mass. blamed distractions from the fiscal cliff standoff, fierce competition from online rivals, and mild weather for a disappointing holiday season. (Globe)
